original_text: And thou shalt overlay it with pure gold, within and without shalt thou overlay it, and shalt make upon it a crown of gold round about.
korean_text: 너는 순금으로 그것을 싸되 그 안팎을 싸고 위쪽 가장자리로 돌아가며 금 테를 두르고

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt overlay it with pure gold
within and without shalt thou overlay it
and shalt make upon it a crown of gold round about
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 위에 금 관을 둘러 만들지니라
